channel.title: How to make the special hit more
channel.description:
Hello i want to no how to increase the max hit with the special for armadyl godsored( ags)..Without changin the stats... Like with the ags max (normall hits) it will be like 40 or w.e and with specs max hit i want it to be like 64...
Thanks

item.title: How to make the special hit more
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

i don’t think t he max hit has went up… would the max spec only work on players or monsters aswell?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make the special hit more

item.title: How to make the special hit more
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

i found this would “gethit” be the same as hitdif? if so all i got to do is change it?
“if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){
setAnimation(3547);
specialAmount -= 50;
getHit(30);
specOn = false;
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis();
specGFX(655);”

Read full topic
item.source: How to make the special hit more

item.title: How to make the special hit more
item.dc:creator: @legend_the_hero legend the hero
item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

some people don’t have that… some people have SpecDamg(60);

just pointing that out

Read full topic
item.source: How to make the special hit more

item.title: How to make the special hit more
item.dc:creator: @_pecial §pecial
item.description:
@_pecial wrote:

Um, search for the ags id in client.java then it has like
special()
Hitdif=60

or somthing round that

then change the 60 to what you want (doubled)

Read full topic
